Package com.example.javenture

Class HouseHoldItemViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.example.javenture.HouseHoldItemViewModel
public class HouseHoldItemViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
This class is used to store the HouseHoldItem objects. It will call the HouseHoldItemRepository to perform CRUD operations on the db. It observes changes to the items collection in the db.
